actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Labor Department; OMB.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that benefits shall be payable to divorced spouses and surviving divorced spouses if they were married to a covered employee for at least 10 years.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to direct that benefits shall be payable to divorced spouses and surviving divorced spouses if they were married to a covered railroad employee for at least ten years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide that benefits shall be payable to divorced spouses and surviving divorced spouses if they were married to a covered employee for at least 10 years.
